title: Democracy in America - cites La Bruyère

content.prompt: The speaker cites La Bruyère and Molière as evidence that writers in powerful European monarchies

choices.label: had traditionally assumed that their primary function was to expose corruption
were able to condemn the foolishness that they discovered within their societies
had more substantive ideas than do writers in democratic republics
justified in their commentaries the magnificence of their courts
